name: @wpgraphql/wp-graphql-acf
description: WPGraphQL for ACF seamlessly integrates Advanced Custom Fields with WPGraphQL

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:php
scripts.lint:php: npm run wp-env:cli -- composer run check-cs -- -d memory_limit=256M
scripts.lint:php:fix: npm run wp-env:cli -- composer run fix-cs -- -d memory_limit=256M
scripts.lint:php:stan: npm run wp-env:cli -- composer run phpstan
scripts.test:codecept:wpunit: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql-acf/ -- bash -c 'export TEST_DB_HOST=${WORDPRESS_DB_HOST:-tests-mysql} TEST_DB_NAME=${WORDPRESS_DB_NAME:-tests-wordpress} TEST_DB_USER=${WORDPRESS_DB_USER:-root} TEST_DB_PASSWORD=${WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD:-password} TEST_WP_TABLE_PREFIX=${TEST_WP_TABLE_PREFIX:-wp_} TEST_WP_DOMAIN=${TEST_WP_DOMAIN:-localhost} TEST_ADMIN_EMAIL=${TEST_ADMIN_EMAIL:-admin@example.org} TEST_WP_ROOT_FOLDER=${TEST_WP_ROOT_FOLDER:-/var/www/html} TEST_THEME=${TEST_THEME:-twentytwentyone} && bash bin/prepare-test-suite.sh && vendor/bin/codecept run wpunit "$@"' --
scripts.test:codecept:acceptance: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql-acf/ -- bash -c 'export TEST_DB_HOST=${WORDPRESS_DB_HOST:-tests-mysql} TEST_DB_NAME=${WORDPRESS_DB_NAME:-tests-wordpress} TEST_DB_USER=${WORDPRESS_DB_USER:-root} TEST_DB_PASSWORD=${WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD:-password} TEST_WP_URL=${TEST_WP_URL:-http://tests-wordpress} TEST_WP_TABLE_PREFIX=${TEST_WP_TABLE_PREFIX:-wp_} TEST_WP_DOMAIN=${TEST_WP_DOMAIN:-localhost} TEST_WP_ROOT_FOLDER=${TEST_WP_ROOT_FOLDER:-/var/www/html} TEST_ADMIN_USERNAME=${TEST_ADMIN_USERNAME:-admin} TEST_ADMIN_PASSWORD=${TEST_ADMIN_PASSWORD:-password} TEST_ADMIN_PATH=${TEST_ADMIN_PATH:-/wp-admin} TEST_ADMIN_EMAIL=${TEST_ADMIN_EMAIL:-admin@example.org} TEST_THEME=${TEST_THEME:-twentytwentyone} && bash bin/prepare-test-suite.sh && vendor/bin/codecept run acceptance "$@"' --
scripts.test:codecept:functional: npm run --prefix ../.. wp-env -- run tests-cli --env-cwd=wp-content/plugins/wp-graphql-acf/ -- bash -c 'export TEST_DB_HOST=${WORDPRESS_DB_HOST:-tests-mysql} TEST_DB_NAME=${WORDPRESS_DB_NAME:-tests-wordpress} TEST_DB_USER=${WORDPRESS_DB_USER:-root} TEST_DB_PASSWORD=${WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD:-password} TEST_WP_URL=${TEST_WP_URL:-http://tests-wordpress} TEST_WP_TABLE_PREFIX=${TEST_WP_TABLE_PREFIX:-wp_} TEST_WP_DOMAIN=${TEST_WP_DOMAIN:-localhost} TEST_WP_ROOT_FOLDER=${TEST_WP_ROOT_FOLDER:-/var/www/html} TEST_ADMIN_USERNAME=${TEST_ADMIN_USERNAME:-admin} TEST_ADMIN_PASSWORD=${TEST_ADMIN_PASSWORD:-password} TEST_ADMIN_PATH=${TEST_ADMIN_PATH:-/wp-admin} TEST_ADMIN_EMAIL=${TEST_ADMIN_EMAIL:-admin@example.org} TEST_THEME=${TEST_THEME:-twentytwentyone} && bash bin/prepare-test-suite.sh && vendor/bin/codecept run functional "$@"' --
